topic.title: How to Make the Value of Custom Field Computable

para.text: How to Make the Value of Custom Field Computable

para.style: text-indent:48px; background-color:#ffffff;
para.text: Values of the custom fields in TrackStudio can not only be set manually, but they can be computed automatically. They can either be computed every time, when the value is displayed, or cached and computed only in case of change in the task properties.

para.style: text-indent:48px; background-color:#ffffff;
para.text: Values of task custom fields can be calculated with the help of scripts, and particularly the scripts, corresponding to the interface

para.style: text-indent:48px; background-color:#ffffff;
text-indent:48px; background-color:#ffffff;
para.text: There are a total of 10 types of custom fields in TrackStudio:
